mapper.select: SELECT department_division.id AS dd_id,department_division.address AS address, division.id AS di_id,division.NAME AS di_name, division.photo AS photo,division.content AS content, departmentt.id AS de_id,departmentt.name AS de_name FROM department_division,division,departmentt WHERE department_division.dep_id=departmentt.id AND department_division.div_id=division.id
